body:
My friend is really interested in music and he wants to become bigger. I listened to him play a new song of his and I realised he's really, really good (well at least in my eyes). He doesn't have much equipment or so but I realised if you guys could tell me what you think, it'll be awesome.

One of his songs:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2rTBmfsQXy0

That song isn't full completed but feel free to check out the rest of his channel if you want to. He's still new and he's not much of an uploader and neither is he a singer. He just loves using the guitar.

title: Support My Mate's Music!
